product.title: Yawning Cat LED Night Light | NEW
product.body_html:
• Description
  • Shipping

  • Illuminate your evening with a cozy corner glow

    Let the soothing, soft light from this adorable night light provide a comforting glow for children and adults alike. Enjoy the soft lighting, while the lamp's design is sure to add that perfect touch to any room. Featuring a cute cat sleeping and yawning ready to light up your life.

    Choose to have a remote that allows you to choose between 16 colors or without a remote that only lets you change between 7 colors. The light is powered by a rechargeable battery and can be charged with a USB cable provided. After a full charge, this portable lamp can last around 10 hours so you can take it with you on your night adventures or to keep your room lit at night.

    With remote: 16 colors
    Without remote: 7 colors

    Benefits of a night light:

    ✨ Soothing Ambiance: Cute night lights create a calming and relaxing atmosphere.
    ✨ Comforting Presence: They provide a gentle and reassuring presence in the dark.
    ✨ Sleep Aid: Night lights can help children and adults feel more secure and sleep better.
    ✨ Fear Reduction: They help alleviate the fear of the dark, particularly in children.
    ✨ Convenience: Night lights provide enough illumination for navigating in the dark without disturbing sleep especially for babies and your partner.
    ✨ Decorative Element: Cute night lights add a touch of whimsy and style to the room decor.
    ✨ Safety: Night lights can prevent accidents by providing visibility during the night.
    ✨ Night time Feedings: They assist with nighttime feedings for infants and young children.
    ✨ Easy to Use: Most night lights are simple to operate, making them user-friendly for all ages.
    ✨ Energy Efficiency: Many night lights are designed to be energy-efficient and consume minimal electricity.



    A gift they will never expect!

    With a convenient size and easy-to-use on/off switch, it's the perfect night light for those early mornings or late nights. Also makes a great gift!

    Features

    😻 Measures 14 x 11 x 7cm
    😻 High-quality Silicone & ABS material
    😻 Warm soft light to keep your room feeling cozy and lit
    😻 Rechargeable battery
    😻 Light Source: LED Bulbs
    😻 Battery capacity: 1200mAh
    😻 Wattage: 0-5W
    😻 Voltage: 5V


  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.


    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: 5-20 Business days
